text:
Hi Dan, no problem, I’m happy to help. It’s good to see you’re already doing an games related course. I assume your first year is quite broad, looking into a lot of different areas. Is there any particular you want to specialize in programming? 

In regards of gaining industry experience there isn’t really a specific way of going about it. If your course offers a placement year that would probably be best and most logical way to go about it.
